text: Tuzanavana mu bituza byabo inzika n’inzangano, (babe mu Ijuru aho) imigezi itemba munsi yabo, nuko bavuge bati “Ishimwe n’ikuzo byuzuye ni ibya Allah watuyoboye muri ibi (byiza), ndetse ntitwari kuyoboka iyo Allah atatuyobora. Mu by’ukuri intumwa za Nyagasani wacu zazanye ukuri.” Nuko bahamagarwe babwirwa bati “Ngiryo Ijuru murazwe kubera ibyo mwakoraga.”
